mapper.update:
update SYS_SCENIC_SPOT_PARKING
PARKING_NAME = #{parkingName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
PARKING_CONTENT = #{parkingContent,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
PARKING_SCENIC_SPOT_ID = #{parkingScenicSpotId,jdbcType=BIGINT},
PARKING_TYPE = #{parkingType,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
COORDINATE_TYPE = #{coordinateType,jdbcType = VARCHAR},
CREATE_DATE = #{createDate,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
UPDATE_DATE = #{updateDate,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
PARKING_COORDINATE_GROUP = #{parkingCoordinateGroup,jdbcType=LONGVARCHAR},
PARKING_COORDINATE_GROUP_BAIDU = #{parkingCoordinateGroupBaidu,jdbcType=LONGVARCHAR},
where PARKING_ID = #{parkingId,jdbcType=BIGINT}

update SYS_SCENIC_SPOT_PARKING set PARKING_NAME = #{parkingName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, PARKING_CONTENT = #{parkingContent,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, PARKING_SCENIC_SPOT_ID = #{parkingScenicSpotId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, PARKING_TYPE = #{parkingType,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, COORDINATE_TYPE = #{coordinateType,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, CREATE_DATE = #{createDate,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, UPDATE_DATE = #{updateDate,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, PARKING_COORDINATE_GROUP = #{parkingCoordinateGroup,jdbcType=LONGVARCHAR}, PARKING_COORDINATE_GROUP_BAIDU = #{parkingCoordinateGroupBaidu,jdbcType=LONGVARCHAR} where PARKING_ID = #{parkingId,jdbcType=BIGINT}

update SYS_SCENIC_SPOT_PARKING set PARKING_NAME = #{parkingName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, PARKING_CONTENT = #{parkingContent,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, PARKING_SCENIC_SPOT_ID = #{parkingScenicSpotId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, PARKING_TYPE = #{parkingType,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, COORDINATE_TYPE = #{coordinateType,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, CREATE_DATE = #{createDate,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, UPDATE_DATE = #{updateDate,jdbcType=VARCHAR} where PARKING_ID = #{parkingId,jdbcType=BIGINT}
mapper.select:
SELECT A.SCENIC_SPOT_NAME AS scenicSpotName, B.* FROM SYS_SCENIC_SPOT A INNER JOIN SYS_SCENIC_SPOT_PARKING B ON A.SCENIC_SPOT_ID = B.PARKING_SCENIC_SPOT_ID
B.PARKING_SCENIC_SPOT_ID = #{parkingScenicSpotId} AND B.COORDINATE_TYPE = 0
AND B.PARKING_NAME LIKE CONCAT('%',#{parkingName},'%')
ORDER BY B.CREATE_DATE DESC

select
,
from SYS_SCENIC_SPOT_PARKING where PARKING_SCENIC_SPOT_ID = #{scenicSpotId} AND PARKING_TYPE = '1' AND COORDINATE_TYPE = '0'

SELECT A.SCENIC_SPOT_NAME AS scenicSpotName, B.* FROM SYS_SCENIC_SPOT A INNER JOIN SYS_SCENIC_SPOT_PARKING B ON A.SCENIC_SPOT_ID = B.PARKING_SCENIC_SPOT_ID
B.PARKING_SCENIC_SPOT_ID = #{parkingScenicSpotId}
AND B.PARKING_NAME LIKE CONCAT('%',#{parkingName},'%')
AND B.COORDINATE_TYPE = 1
ORDER BY B.CREATE_DATE DESC

select
,
from SYS_SCENIC_SPOT_PARKING where PARKING_SCENIC_SPOT_ID = #{scenicSpotId} AND PARKING_TYPE = '1' AND COORDINATE_TYPE = '1'
select PARKING_ID,PARKING_NAME from SYS_SCENIC_SPOT_PARKING where PARKING_TYPE = 1 and COORDINATE_TYPE = 0 and PARKING_SCENIC_SPOT_ID = #{scenicSpotId}
